DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study look effect strength training preventing overuse injury female runner
DOC.brief_title: Effects Strength Training Musculoskeletal Overuse Injuries Female Runners
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial compare effect 9-months strength training control group : ( 1 ) injury rate female runner 9 month intervention period , 9 month complete intervention , ( 2 ) potential mechanisms injury include strength , joint tissue loading , psychosocial factor .
DOC.criteria: Female civilian runner 1860 year old Run least 5 mile per week past 6 month No overuse injury past 6 month Plan stay area next year half Live le 30 mile Wake Forest University Male Under age 18 age 60 Chronic disease , orthopedic condition , past anterior cruciate ligament tear Currently pregnant plan conceive within next 18 month Observed study staff unwilling attend testing/intervention session Observed study staff unwilling communicate via telephone email regularly study personnel Participated formal strength training past 6 month Current active military active military reserve
